sn35.171-173:1: "Bhikkhus, you should abandon desire for whatever is suffering … . You should abandon lust for whatever is suffering … . You should abandon desire and lust for whatever is suffering. And what is suffering? The eye is suffering … The mind is suffering; you should abandon desire and lust for it.sn.iv.50Bhikkhus, you should abandon desire and lust for whatever is suffering."
